name: Pineapple Jamm!
description:
Run, Jump, And talk to your friends in this Gorilla tag fan game.

In this game you play as a PINEAPPLE and you can go to many maps like Forest, Desert, And a big House.

Thank you for the support and have a lot of fun.

Any form of support helps feel free to tell me if there is anything you find wrong of a bug it helps a lot.

Remember to have fun and be a good PINEAPPLE.
